processingCommand.script:
:DEFINE &AMODULES#, string, 20
:FILL &AMODULES#[] = STR_SPLIT("&MODULES#", ",")
:SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&AMODULES#[])

! Backup modules
:SET &WMS_BACKUP#           = "false"
:SET &REFS_BACKUP#          = "false"
:SET &RW_BACKUP#            = "false"
:SET &EMS_BACKUP#           = "false"
:SET &WMS_FAIL_BACKUP#      = "false"
:SET &REFS_FAIL_BACKUP#     = "false"
:SET &RW_FAIL_BACKUP#       = "false"
:SET &EMS_FAIL_BACKUP#      = "false"
:SET &WMS_DB_BACKUP#        = "false"
:SET &REFS_DB_BACKUP#       = "false"
:SET &EMS_DB_BACKUP#        = "false"
:SET &WMS_ARCH_DB_BACKUP#   = "false"

:SET &WMS_BACKUP_FILE#      = ""
:SET &REFS_BACKUP_FILE#     = ""
:SET &RW_BACKUP_FILE#       = ""
:SET &EMS_BACKUP_FILE#      = ""

:SET &WMS_DB_CHECK#         = "false"
:SET &REFS_DB_CHECK#        = "false"
:SET &EMS_DB_CHECK#         = "false"
:SET &WMS_ARCH_DB_CHECK#    = "false"

:SET &SRC_WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER#   = ""
:SET &SRC_REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER#  = ""
:SET &SRC_EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER#   = ""
:SET &SRC_RW_PRIMARY_SERVER#    = ""
:SET &SRC_WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER#  = ""
:SET &SRC_REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER# = ""
:SET &SRC_EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER#  = ""
:SET &SRC_RW_FAILOVER_SERVER#   = ""

:SET &SRC_WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#   = ""
:SET &SRC_REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#  = ""
:SET &SRC_EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#   = ""
:SET &SRC_RW_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#    = ""
:SET &SRC_WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#  = ""
:SET &SRC_REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL# = ""
:SET &SRC_EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#  = ""
:SET &SRC_RW_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#   = ""


! Run backup of the module, if the module exists in AFSM
:IF &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &WMS_BACKUP# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &REFS_BACKUP# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &EMS_BACKUP# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &RW_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &RW_BACKUP# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &WMS_FAIL_BACKUP# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &REFS_FAIL_BACKUP# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &RW_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &RW_FAIL_BACKUP# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &EMS_FAIL_BACKUP# = "true"
:ENDIF


:SET &SRC_WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# = &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER#
:SET &SRC_WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL# = &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#
:SET &SRC_REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER# = &REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER#
:SET &SRC_REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL# = &REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#
:SET &SRC_RW_PRIMARY_SERVER# = &RW_PRIMARY_SERVER#
:SET &SRC_RW_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL# = &RW_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#
:SET &SRC_EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# = &EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER#
:SET &SRC_EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL# = &EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#
:SET &SRC_WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# = &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER#
:SET &SRC_WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#  = &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#
:SET &SRC_REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER# = &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER#
:SET &SRC_REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#  = &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#
:SET &SRC_RW_FAILOVER_SERVER# = &RW_FAILOVER_SERVER#
:SET &SRC_RW_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL# = &RW_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#
:SET &SRC_EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# = &EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER#
:SET &SRC_EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL# = &EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#

:SET &RUNVAR# = 1
:WHILE &RUNVAR# LE &LEN#
:  SWITCH "Y"
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "DB_WMS"
:      SET &WMS_DB_CHECK# = "true"
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "DB_REFS"
:      SET &REFS_DB_CHECK# = "true"
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "DB_EMS"
:      SET &EMS_DB_CHECK# = "true"
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "DB_ARCH"
:      SET &WMS_ARCH_DB_CHECK# = "true"
:      SET &WMS_ARCH_DB_BACKUP# = "true"
:  ENDSWITCH
:  SET &RUNVAR# = &RUNVAR# + 1
:ENDWHILE

:IF &REST_MODULES_DB# = ""
:  SET &DB_MANAGEMENT_SERVER_PRIMARY# = ""
:  SET &DB_MANAGEMENT_SERVER_SECONDARY# = ""
:  SET &DB_DIRECTORY_NAME# = ""
:  SET &DB_BACKUP_PATH# = ""
:  SET &DB_RUN_MODE# = ""
:  PUBLISH &DB_MANAGEMENT_SERVER_PRIMARY#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &DB_MANAGEMENT_SERVER_SECONDARY#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &DB_DIRECTORY_NAME#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &DB_BACKUP_PATH#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &DB_RUN_MODE#,,WORKFLOW

:  SET &WMS_DB_VIP_PRI# = ""
:  SET &WMS_DB_PORT# = ""
:  SET &WMS_DB_SID# = ""
:  SET &WMS_DB_USERNAME# = ""
:  SET &WMS_DB_PASSWORD# = ""
:  SET &WMS_DB_SCHEMA# = ""
:  PUBLISH &WMS_DB_VIP_PRI#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &WMS_DB_PORT#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &WMS_DB_SID#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &WMS_DB_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &WMS_DB_PASSWORD#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &WMS_DB_SCHEMA#,,WORKFLOW

:  SET &WMS_ARCH_DB_VIP_PRI# = ""
:  SET &WMS_ARCH_DB_PORT# = ""
:  SET &WMS_ARCH_DB_SID# = ""
:  SET &WMS_ARCH_DB_USERNAME# = ""
:  SET &WMS_ARCH_DB_PASSWORD# = ""
:  SET &WMS_ARCH_DB_SCHEMA# = ""
:  PUBLISH &WMS_ARCH_DB_VIP_PRI#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &WMS_ARCH_DB_PORT#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &WMS_ARCH_DB_SID#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &WMS_ARCH_DB_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &WMS_ARCH_DB_PASSWORD#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &WMS_ARCH_DB_SCHEMA#,,WORKFLOW

:  SET &REFS_DB_VIP_PRI# = ""
:  SET &REFS_DB_PORT# = ""
:  SET &REFS_DB_SID# = ""
:  SET &REFS_DB_USERNAME# = ""
:  SET &REFS_DB_PASSWORD# = ""
:  SET &REFS_DB_SCHEMA# = ""
:  PUBLISH &REFS_DB_VIP_PRI#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &REFS_DB_PORT#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &REFS_DB_SID#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &REFS_DB_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &REFS_DB_PASSWORD#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &REFS_DB_SCHEMA#,,WORKFLOW

:  SET &EMS_DB_VIP_PRI# = ""
:  SET &EMS_DB_PORT# = ""
:  SET &EMS_DB_SID# = ""
:  SET &EMS_DB_USERNAME# = ""
:  SET &EMS_DB_PASSWORD# = ""
:  SET &EMS_DB_SCHEMA# = ""
:  PUBLISH &EMS_DB_VIP_PRI#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &EMS_DB_PORT#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &EMS_DB_SID#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &EMS_DB_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &EMS_DB_PASSWORD#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &EMS_DB_SCHEMA#,,WORKFLOW
:ENDIF


:PUBLISH &WMS_BACKUP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_BACKUP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_BACKUP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_BACKUP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_FAIL_BACKUP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_FAIL_BACKUP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_FAIL_BACKUP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_FAIL_BACKUP#,,WORKFLOW

:PUBLISH &WMS_DB_BACKUP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_DB_BACKUP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_DB_BACKUP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_ARCH_DB_BACKUP#,,WORKFLOW

:PUBLISH &WMS_BACKUP_FILE#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_BACKUP_FILE#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_BACKUP_FILE#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_BACKUP_FILE#,,WORKFLOW

:PUBLISH &WMS_DB_CHECK#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_DB_CHECK#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_DB_CHECK#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_ARCH_DB_CHECK#,,WORKFLOW

:PUBLISH &SRC_WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_RW_PRIMARY_SERVER#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_RW_FAILOVER_SERVER#,,WORKFLOW

:PUBLISH &SRC_WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_RW_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_RW_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW

! Undeploy
:SET &SRC_WMS_DB_VIP_PRI# = &WMS_DB_VIP_PRI#
:SET &SRC_WMS_DB_PORT# = &WMS_DB_PORT#
:SET &SRC_WMS_DB_SID# = &WMS_DB_SID#
:SET &SRC_WMS_DB_USERNAME# = &WMS_DB_USERNAME#
:SET &SRC_WMS_DB_PASSWORD# = &WMS_DB_PASSWORD#
:SET &SRC_WMS_DB_SCHEMA# = &WMS_DB_SCHEMA#
:SET &SRC_WMS_DB_TABLESPACE_NAME# = &WMS_DB_TABLESPACE_NAME#
:SET &SRC_WMS_DB_ADMIN_USERNAME# = &WMS_DB_ADMIN_USERNAME#
:SET &SRC_WMS_DB_ADMIN_PASSWORD# = &WMS_DB_ADMIN_PASSWORD#
:PUBLISH &SRC_WMS_DB_VIP_PRI#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_WMS_DB_PORT#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_WMS_DB_SID#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_WMS_DB_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_WMS_DB_PASSWORD#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_WMS_DB_SCHEMA#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_WMS_DB_TABLESPACE_NAME#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_WMS_DB_ADMIN_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_WMS_DB_ADMIN_PASSWORD#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &SRC_WMS_ARCH_DB_VIP_PRI# = &WMS_ARCH_DB_VIP_PRI#
:SET &SRC_WMS_ARCH_DB_PORT# = &WMS_ARCH_DB_PORT#
:SET &SRC_WMS_ARCH_DB_SID# = &WMS_ARCH_DB_SID#
:SET &SRC_WMS_ARCH_DB_USERNAME# = &WMS_ARCH_DB_USERNAME#
:SET &SRC_WMS_ARCH_DB_PASSWORD# = &WMS_ARCH_DB_PASSWORD#
:SET &SRC_WMS_ARCH_DB_SCHEMA# = &WMS_ARCH_DB_SCHEMA#
:SET &SRC_WMS_ARCH_DB_TABLE_NAME# = &WMS_ARCH_DB_TABLESPACE_NAME#
:SET &SRC_WMS_ARCH_DB_A_USERNAME# = &WMS_ARCH_DB_ADMIN_USERNAME#
:SET &SRC_WMS_ARCH_DB_A_PASSWORD# = &WMS_ARCH_DB_ADMIN_PASSWORD#
:PUBLISH &SRC_WMS_ARCH_DB_VIP_PRI#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_WMS_ARCH_DB_PORT#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_WMS_ARCH_DB_SID#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_WMS_ARCH_DB_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_WMS_ARCH_DB_PASSWORD#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_WMS_ARCH_DB_SCHEMA#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_WMS_ARCH_DB_TABLE_NAME#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_WMS_ARCH_DB_A_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_WMS_ARCH_DB_A_PASSWORD#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &SRC_REFS_DB_VIP_PRI# = &REFS_DB_VIP_PRI#
:SET &SRC_REFS_DB_PORT# = &REFS_DB_PORT#
:SET &SRC_REFS_DB_SID# = &REFS_DB_SID#
:SET &SRC_REFS_DB_USERNAME# = &REFS_DB_USERNAME#
:SET &SRC_REFS_DB_PASSWORD# = &REFS_DB_PASSWORD#
:SET &SRC_REFS_DB_SCHEMA# = &REFS_DB_SCHEMA#
:SET &SRC_REFS_DB_TABLESPACE_NAME# = &REFS_DB_TABLESPACE_NAME#
:SET &SRC_REFS_DB_ADMIN_USERNAME# = &REFS_DB_ADMIN_USERNAME#
:SET &SRC_REFS_DB_ADMIN_PASSWORD# = &REFS_DB_ADMIN_PASSWORD#
:PUBLISH &SRC_REFS_DB_VIP_PRI#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_REFS_DB_PORT#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_REFS_DB_SID#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_REFS_DB_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_REFS_DB_PASSWORD#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_REFS_DB_SCHEMA#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_REFS_DB_TABLESPACE_NAME#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_REFS_DB_ADMIN_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_REFS_DB_ADMIN_PASSWORD#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &SRC_EMS_DB_VIP_PRI# = &EMS_DB_VIP_PRI#
:SET &SRC_EMS_DB_PORT# = &EMS_DB_PORT#
:SET &SRC_EMS_DB_SID# = &EMS_DB_SID#
:SET &SRC_EMS_DB_USERNAME# = &EMS_DB_USERNAME#
:SET &SRC_EMS_DB_PASSWORD# = &EMS_DB_PASSWORD#
:SET &SRC_EMS_DB_SCHEMA# = &EMS_DB_SCHEMA#
:SET &SRC_EMS_DB_TABLESPACE_NAME# = &EMS_DB_TABLESPACE_NAME#
:SET &SRC_EMS_DB_ADMIN_USERNAME# = &EMS_DB_ADMIN_USERNAME#
:SET &SRC_EMS_DB_ADMIN_PASSWORD# = &EMS_DB_ADMIN_PASSWORD#
:PUBLISH &SRC_EMS_DB_VIP_PRI#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_EMS_DB_PORT#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_EMS_DB_SID#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_EMS_DB_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_EMS_DB_PASSWORD#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_EMS_DB_SCHEMA#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_EMS_DB_TABLESPACE_NAME#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_EMS_DB_ADMIN_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SRC_EMS_DB_ADMIN_PASSWORD#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &INSTANCE_STOP# = "N"
:PUBLISH &INSTANCE_STOP#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &COPY_INTEGRATOR# = "N"
:PUBLISH &COPY_INTEGRATOR#,,WORKFLOW
